name: Table
description: Table component for tabular data with styling options including headers, footers, captions, and different display modes for accessible data presentation.

is_striped.description: Whether to show table with striped rows.

is_data_table.description: Whether to show as a data table.

examples.name: Basic Table
examples.description: Simple table with headers and data rows

examples.name: Striped Data Table
examples.description: Table with alternating row colors and footer

examples.name: Table with Links
examples.description: Table containing interactive links in cells

when_to_use: Display tabular data with rows and columns
Present comparative information in structured format
Show lists of items with multiple attributes
Create data tables for reports and analytics
when_not_to_use: For layout purposes - use CSS Grid or Flexbox instead
For single-column lists - use list component instead
For complex data visualization - consider charts or graphs
On very small screens where tables become difficult to read
best_practices: Always include meaningful headers for accessibility
Use captions to describe the table's purpose
Consider striped rows for better readability of large datasets
Ensure tables are responsive and readable on mobile devices
Use appropriate data attributes for mobile responsiveness
Keep cell content concise and scannable
Use consistent data formatting within columns

accessibility.notes: Tables are inherently accessible when properly structured with headers, captions, and scope attributes. The component includes data-title attributes for responsive mobile display.

known_issues: Large tables may require horizontal scrolling on mobile devices
Complex nested content in cells can affect mobile responsiveness
variations: Basic table: Simple rows and columns with headers
Striped table: Alternating row background colors for readability
Data table: Enhanced styling for data-heavy content
Caption positioning: Caption before or after table content
With footer: Tables that include summary or total rows
